scenes.background: Monica and Bob are still discussing celebration plans.
scenes.description: Monica sighs and says, 'Formal dinners are so stiff and boring.'

options.text: Formal dinners can be elegant and memorable. Let's give it a try.
options.analysis: You showed confidence in the idea, displaying good self-regulation and motivation, but perception and empathy were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we can incorporate some fun elements to make the dinner more lively.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and proposed a compromise, showing good perception and empathy, but social skill and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Formal dinners might not be everyone's cup of tea; let's consider more options.
options.analysis: You showed good social skill by considering other options, but perception, empathy, and self-regulation were moderate.
